alert.note: Alert for Clay; Davidson; Macon; Rutherford; Smith; Sumner; Trousdale; Williamson; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 1:02PM CST until January 01 at 1:45PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Smith County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Davidson County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Rutherford County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Sumner County in Middle Tennessee... Northeastern Williamson County in Middle Tennessee... Wilson County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Clay County in Middle Tennessee... Macon County in Middle Tennessee... Trousdale County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 145 PM CST. * At 101 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Scottsville to Forest Hills, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Franklin, Gallatin, Lebanon, Lafayette, Hartsville, Hendersonville, Smyrna, Brentwood, La Vergne, Mount Juliet, Nolensville, Forest Hills, Oak Hill, Lakewood, Westmoreland, Red Boiling Springs, Hermitage, Rural Hill, Antioch and Belinda City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for Middle Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Davidson; Macon; Rutherford; Smith; Sumner; Trousdale; Williamson; Wilson
